name: Verdant Dew
desc:
Within 2.5s after party members trigger Lunar-Bloom reactions, your party will receive 1 Verdant Dew every 2.5s.
Your party can have up to 3 Verdant Dew. If you trigger another Lunar-Bloom reaction during this time, the duration of this effect will be reset.

imgDesc.text:
Within 2.5s after party members trigger Lunar-Bloom reactions, your party will receive 1 Verdant Dew every 2.5s.
Your party can have up to 3 Verdant Dew. If you trigger another Lunar-Bloom reaction during this time, the duration of this effect will be reset.
Certain characters can consume Verdant Dew to deal Lunar-Bloom DMG to enemies.
